subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh had 34 points and 16 rebounds in outplaying his fellow All-Star big man, Dwight Howard, in the host Toronto Raptors’ 92-85 victory against the Orlando Magic last night.
snippet: Chris Bosh had 34 points and 16 rebounds in outplaying his fellow All-Star big man, Dwight Howard, in the host Toronto Raptors’ 92-85 victory against the Orlando Magic last night.
